data.eml:eml: Five new species and new records of biting midges of the genus Dasyhelea Kieffer from the Near East (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Dominiak, Patrycja, Alwin, Alicja (2013): Five new species and new records of biting midges of the genus Dasyhelea Kieffer from the Near East (Diptera: Ceratopogonidae). Zootaxa 3683 (2): 133-144, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3683.2.3
